name: Electrolink
description:
GGJ2020 Game

Electrolink is a 2D platformer where you have connect your portable power source to the energy system of this run down place in order to restore the energy. The challenge is to smartly navigate with your electric cable between the platform so the sharp crystals don't cut it.

WASD - moving
SPACE - jump
R - restart
ESC - quit
Left Mouse Button - zoom out
Right Mouse Button - zoom in
